name: dixitOnline
summary: An online version of the card game Dixit.
description: Using only client side javascript and Firebase realtime db, we will create an online version of the seminal card game, Dixit.

name: devCircle
summary: A project collaboration hub for trilogy bootcamp grads.
description: Remember how we used to learn a new technology each week? Remember how we would ingrain the new knowledge with either a homework assignment or group project? It worked didn't it?! Well, grads, let's continue that progress. This site will allow recent grads to remain in contact and collaboration towards continuing self education of new technologies. We will use node, express, react, passport, and mongoose.

name: cahGame
summary: A browser version of the best game ever - Cards Against Humanity!
description: Firebase, javascript, HTML, and CSS. Plus 2000 cards in a JSON file. Let's do it.

name: greenThumb
summary: Allow the everyday person to become a master gardener.
description: We will provide planting recommendations and care instructions for plants specific to your region.

name: easyEats
summary: A site where users can find, share, and save their favorite recipes.
description: On your first visit to EasyEats, you can search for recipes by name, by ingredient, or by the username of the person who created that recipe. After completing signup/login with our robust user authentication, users will be able to contribute their own recipes to our database and save starred recipes to their profile page. While our authentication system is functioning, we are still working out some bugs with username searches and users adding recipes.

name: gregis
summary: From the surf to the city and everywhere in-between, GREGIS will give you the inside scoop on San Diego.
description: Let's build an app for social san diegans like ourselves. All front end client side. Let's see how much we can do with no backend!

name: lindasList
summary: The right hairstyle can help people make a great first impression, help them look their best for special occasions.
description: Linda's List is a free website for both stylists and prospective clients. Users can perform a detailed search for the stylists who meet their interests, schedule, and budget. Stylists can list their bios/credentials and examples of their work to help clients make an informed decision. Our goal is to take the hassle out of finding a new stylist so you can start enjoying your new look ASAP!
